hero_lead: Qori Labsqa kawsaypaq yachay wasi kanki, chaypi Andino yuyaynin hukllawasqa IA ñawpaqman tinkuspa ayllu kawsayta yanapananpaq.
meta_home_description: Kawsaypi kawsanapaq yachay wasi, chaypi Andino yuyay hinaspa allin IA tinkuspa ayllu kawsayta yanapan—mana qhawachiyta, mana qhatu llank'ayta, mana qhatu qhatuta ruwaspa.
meta_whitepaper_title: Qori Labs | Ayni Yachay: Ayllu Willakuy Servicio SMSmanta
footer_rights: Llapan yachay ruranakuna Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 4.0 nisqawan hinallataq ayllu uywakunawan rimanakuspa rakisqa kanku.
indigenous_body: Cusco llaqtakunawan sumaq rimanakuspa, musuq teknologíakuna imayna ayllu kawsayninta, kultura qhipachiyta, sapasachaq kawsay munayninkuta yanapananpaq—Ayni chaymanta Minka nisqa Andino prinsipionkunawan pusaspa. Kaynu runakuna, yachay wasikuna, institucionkuna kay yupaywan tinkuyta munasunkiman, ñuqanchikwan kuska rimanakuspa.
framework_body: Tukuy llamk'aykuna HigherSelf.ai nisqawan purichkan, chayqa Andino yuyayninkuna Yachay (allin yachay), Llank’ay (allin llamk'ay), Munay (allin munay) nisqakunata qhawachin.
ethics_consent_body: Kay llamk'aynikunapaqmi llank'ay allin kawsayta munasqanchikwan tikrasqa. Cusco llaqtakunawanmi q'aparispa sumaq rimanakuyta rurashanchik, comunidadmi kamachiq teknologíapaq imaymana kultura qhipachiyta allin kawsayta yanapananpaq. Manan imapas ruwashanchu mana kaptin willakuy, kuska munayninkuta, kutichisqa kamachiyta. Kay yachayta, llank'ayta munankukuna aswan runakuna, yachay wasikuna masikunata qaparichiyku kay rimanakuyta hukllachaspa.
ethics_firewall_body: Qori Labsqa mana qhatupi qamachiq kayninwanmi yachay rurayta apamun. Manan qollqe, willakuy, marka sutinpas qhatu llamk'ayman pasanichu; kay saywami comunidadmi kamachiq yachaykunata mercadospa kallpanchayninmanta waqaychaspa.
partners_chahu_body: Cusco llaqtakunawan ñawpaq rimanakuspa, comunidadmi kamachiq teknologíakuna allin kawsaypaq hina kultura qhipachiyta maskharispa.
partners_prison_body: Cusco justicia kurumawan yanaparikuspa, dignidadta allin kawsayta hunt'anapaq teknologíakunata maskhaspa.
projects_recip_sites: Kiti: local communities in Cusco (ongoing). We invite other communities and institutions who share these values to join the conversation.
projects_recip_outputs: Rurasqa: Kallpachasqa agente open-source, kamachiy qillqakuna, kuska qillqasqa qillqakuna (hamuq).
projects_recip_guardrail: Yupaychay kamachiy: Mana datos chaskichu mana munasqallapaqpas. Mana modelokuna ruwasqachu comunidad qhawayta mana kaptin. Mana qillqakuna qhapisqachu mana kuska qillqasqa kaptin.
projects_higherself_body: Andino yuyay prinsipionkunaqa federado, offline llamk'aq IA sistemakunaman churaypaq kamachiy ñawpaq qillqa. Qhawarina tekniko →
contact_intro: Yachay rimanakuy, hukllawasqa qillqakuna, yachaq wawa llamk'ayta kuska ruraykuta qhawayku. Ama hina, wasiyki kamachiywan yachay rurayniki ñawpaq willakuywan qillqaykuy.
contact_notice: Ama qhatu utaq textile willakuy apachiychu—manan kutichisqachu.
whitepaper_title: Ayni Yachay: Ayllu Willakuy Servicio SMSmanta (Qillqa Yuraq)
whitepaper_disclaimer_body:
Qori Labsqa mana qhatuq llank'aymi; ayllukunapa munayninkupaqmi llamk'achkan.

Kay qillqaqa Ayni Yachayta qhawachin, ayllu runakunapaq SMS willakuy servicio, internet mana reqsispa.

Tekniku kaynin: unidad, integracion, SMS simulacion llank'aykunapi huk qhawariqpi yachachisqa.

Manaraqmi llaqtapi churakusqachu, niqa GSM redpi qhawarisqachu. Llaqtapi rurayqa ethics aprobacion, ayllu hakuynin (FPIC) chaskisqa, permiso kananmanmi qallarinqa.

Tikray: ñawpaq mask'aqkuna ima transportemninta k'askichiyta rurakusqaqa huk sumaq t'aqlla tarirqusqa.

Ayni Yachayqa llapa mana SMS huknin imata archivuchkan, kayqa chaylla atikuq llank'ayta, FPIC cumpliriyta, ayllu stewardkuna kamachiyta qawachkan.
whitepaper_exec_body:
Andes llaqtakunapi kay sasachakuykuna kutiyku:

  • Hampiq wasiman karu puriy, chayqa hark'asqa kasqanmi tariykuchkan.
  • Hatun rantikunapi chaninchalla rantiy, willakuy ch'ullanchasqa kawsayrayku.
  • Ayllu tantanakuykunaqa imaymana uywaykunawan utaq karu kawsayrayku sasachakun.

Ayni Yachayqa kay sasachakuykuna SMS lliw chaninayuq willakuykunawan kutichin:

  • SALUD: hampiq wasikuna imayna servicio kasqan, mayqen punchaw kachkan.
  • PRECIO: rantiykama allin chanin willakuyta hap'iy.
  • COMUNIDAD: ayllu tantanakuykunapa, willakuykunapa, yuyarinakuykuna.

Kayqa mana "IA" nisqachu; imaynataq willakuyta pipas kamachinqa nisqata rikhuchin.

Ayni Yachayqa kamachiyta aylluman kutichin: steward runakuna willakuy apachinku, ñawpaq ayllu rimanakuy (FPIC) hina, privacy waqaychasqa kachkan.
whitepaper_trends_body:
Perúpa Estrategia Nacional Desarrollo Digital 2024-2030qa llaqtakuna ruralkunata yanapachkan; Ayni Yachayqa internet mana kanmanpas willakuy apachiyta atikun.

Ayni Yachayqa hatun chaninmi: sasachakuy punchawkunata llapa ayllukunapaq allinchayta atikun.

PROCIENCIA "Semilla" programaq hatun impacto maskan. Ayni Yachayqa prototipo hina chay llapa ruraypi ñawpaq qhawariykunaman churanaypaq listo.
whitepaper_communities_body:
• Ayllu kamachin: yachaq, hampiq yanapakuq utaq wayna warmikuna CLI simplepi temakunata apachinqa; instalacion qhipa programadorta manan munanchu.
  • FPIC ñawpaq: runa sapaq suscripcionqa manan chaskisqachu chaymantaqa ayllu tantanakuy, actapi qelqasqa, kutichiy hinalla.
  • Privacy designmanta: base de datosqa hash saltniyuq celular numerokunata qelqan; hoqninkuna CSV offlinepi stewardpa uywanapi kachkan.
  • Chinkayta lluqsichiy: "STOP" nirqanqa llapa suscripcionta chinkachin, imayna temakuna pichasqanta willapi.
  • Mana nube: makina local GSM modemmanta llamk'an, willakuy chaskiyqa runakunapaq chaninalla.
whitepaper_approach_body:
Ñawpaq: mask'akuy transportemanta, consentimiento ñanpi tapukuy.

Kunan: SMS ñawpaq, mana SMS componentes archivuchkan, hinaspa servicio churasqa, FPIC qatiykuy, steward manejopi.
whitepaper_framework_body:
• FPIC ñawpaq: ayllu kamachinanta localpi qelqay (community_consent = granted). Mana kay kanmanraq, manan suscripcion chaskinchu.
  • Suscripcion simple (SMS): SALUD, PRECIO utaq COMUNIDAD apachiy. Sistemaqa khipallan 4 cifran yuyaq kodeta churin auditoriapaq.
  • STOP nirqanpaq: llapa suscripcionta pichan, imayna temakunata qichusqanta riqsichin.
  • Tema willay (steward): 
    reciprocal-intelligence broadcast --topic salud|precio|comunidad --text "..."

    Chay temapi tiyan llapa suscriptorakunaman chayan.

  • Privacy: numerokuna phonebook.csvpi hash -> numero nisqawan qelqasqa, offlinepi; base de datosqa manan numero claromanta qellqanchu.
whitepaper_agent_body:
• Hardware: energia pisiyuq Linux makina (Raspberry Pi hina) + GSM modem; inti willaywanmi puriyta atikun.
  • SMS: Gammu SMSD archivo spoolniyuq, Python puenteqa qhaway, ñawinchay, kamachiykunata llank'achin.
  • Base de datos (SQLite):
    • participants (msisdn_hash)
    • community_consent (granted/revoked + razón)
    • subscriptions (participant_id, topic in {salud, precio, comunidad}, user_code 4 digitokuna)
    • consent_events (sapa runa revocacionnin)
    • messages y processing_log (trazabilidad simple, TTL)
  • CLI stewardkunaqpaq: 
    reciprocal-intelligence init-db
reciprocal-intelligence community-consent --status granted|revoked --reason "Acta YYYY-MM-DD"
reciprocal-intelligence broadcast --topic salud|precio|comunidad --text "..."
whitepaper_roadmap_body:
1. Fase 1: ayllu tantanakuy -> FPIC -> steward yachachiy (CLI, phonebook uywa, privacy).
  2. Fase 2: suscripcion willayta willapakuy (afichekuna, radio, tantanakuy): SALUD, PRECIO, COMUNIDAD.
  3. Fase 3: ñawpaq willakuy apachiy + rimanakuy yuyariy runakunawan (pacha waqay, chanin yuyay, participacion allinchay).
whitepaper_recommendations_body:
• Pacha waqay: runakunapa munayninkuwan willakuy, mana mosoq puriyta ruranku.
  • Chani yuyay: rantiyman ripuy antes willakuy chaninta hap'iy.
  • Tantanakuy: ayllu rimanakuykuna aswan runakunawan kananpaq.
  • Kamay qhipa: stewardkuna ch'usay mana yanapakuqta llamk'achkan.
whitepaper_risks_body:
• SIM suyuy: SIM PIN churay, ch'ullchi uywayku, librotipi qelqay.
  • Equipo apay: disco q'epiy (encrypt), data pisiyachiy, copia local ayllu uywanapi.
  • Phonebook qhawariy: USB encryptado, mana correo utaq mensajeriapi apachiy, killa killa tikray, steward kamaynin.
  • Número manan allin: qellqapi qhawachiy, CLIqa llapa sumaq hina qhawachin mana stewardta maqaq.
  • Aswan willay: tema doble qhawariy, ayllu rimanakuywan llapa chaskiq willayta churay.
whitepaper_monitoring_body:
Perúpaq:

  • Ayllu willay stewardkunata yanapay: hardware kit (RPi + modem + energia), yachachiy, mantenimiento.
  • Ley 29735ta ruray: Quechua palabra clavekuna SMS suscripcion chinkachiy, entidad publikokunaq kamachiy.
  • Willakuy chaskiy libre: SMS interes publikomanpa allin qawanapaq.
  • Ética local: FPIC, data pisiyachiy sistemas de alerta publikokunapi.

Investigacion y ruwasqa:

  • Kunan chinkaykunapaq ruwayku; runakunapa pacha, chanin, participacion imayna allinmi qhawachiy.
  • Kodigo kichasqa, data suyunchisqa: licencia kawsaypaq, datos personales base de datosmanta hukpi, bilingue (ES/QU) materialkunata ruray.
whitepaper_firewall_body:
• Ayni Yachay kodigo: ayllupa alli llapaq, MIT licencianpi.
  • Yanapay: hardware kit ñawpaq (qollqe kashanman), instalacion, steward yachachiy.
  • Kamachiy yuyay: punchaw punchaw llank'ay, consentimiento, willakuy ayllupim quedan; mana nube, mana Qori Labs dependencian qhipaman.
whitepaper_vision_body:
• Huk steward hampi servicio kasqanpi SMS willapi willakuy apachin.
  • Huk familia mana munasqa puriyta saqen.
  • Huk steward rantiy chaninta feriapura willakuy rikhuchin.
  • Uyway masikuna tiempo willaykuna chaskinku.
  • Llapan datakuna localpi quedan. Llapan kamachiy aylluman kutin.
whitepaper_citations_body:
• Ruray qallarinkama: ayllu tantanakuy, FPIC localpi qelqasqa.
  • Suscripcion: SALUD / PRECIO / COMUNIDAD apachiy -> confirmacion + 4 digitokuna.
  • Broadcast (steward): 
    reciprocal-intelligence broadcast --topic salud|precio|comunidad --text "..."
  • Ch'utay: STOP apachiy -> llapa suscripcionqa hukllata pichasqa, temakunata yuyarichin.
  • Privacy: DBpi hash saltniyuq, phonebook.csv USB encryptadopi, qellqakuna pisi tiempo kawsan.
whitepaper_call_body:
• Labpiñam qhawarisqa (mana GSM llaqtapi, mana ayllu rurayninkupaq).
  • Commandkuna españolpi; Quechua palabran suscripcionman, IVR (rimay) huk hamuqmanta ruwasqa.
  • Mana SMS componentes ñawpaq ruraymanta archivuchkan, mana llamk'achkan.
whitepaper_conclusion_body:
The AI-first world is not inevitable; it is designed. We are in conversation with those who have long practiced reciprocal wisdom. From them, we learn: technology must serve life, not extraction. If AI is to have a place in the Andes and behind prison walls, it must practice Ayni—returning value for every touch; it must move with Minka—built in collective work; and it must be measured in Yachay, Llankay, and Munay—wisdom, work, and heart held together.

This is the path Qori Labs is exploring. We will not claim to lead; we seek to earn the right to co-create, by consent, at the pace of trust, and with clear lines between research and commerce. The work ahead is technical, legal, and cultural. Above all, it is ethical. Join us in making an AI world that does not bypass those at the margins, but learns—humbly—to stand with them.
whitepaper_appendix_a_title: Appendix A: Quick mapping of principles to requirements (summary)
whitepaper_appendix_a_body:
• Ayni → Ayni ledger; benefit return triggers; community review cycles.
  • Minka → Co-design workshops; community stewards; shared decision logs.
  • Yachay–Llankay–Munay → Evaluation metrics across quality, utility, dignity.
  • UNESCO AI Ethics → System cards, human oversight, privacy protections, fairness checks.
  • CARE Principles → Community authority over data; responsible, ethical use; collective benefit.
  • UNDRIP and ILO 169 → Free, prior, informed consent; respect for communal knowledge.
  • Mandela Rules → No predictive risk scoring; access to information and health; privacy in communications; human-centered rehabilitation.
whitepaper_appendix_b_body:
• Code: MIT License to maximize adoption and transparency.
  • Data: Community-defined licenses; sacred content excluded from digitization; communal content under non-commercial, attribution, no-derivatives or time-bound terms as decided locally.
  • Models: Use open models compatible with on-device quantization; publish configuration and safety layers; do not release any model fine-tuned on sacred or sensitive data.
whitepaper_finalnote_body: This document is not a technical manual. It is a moral compass for the AI age. Every sentence is written to reflect a simple commitment: we are here to listen, to learn, and to return value—not to extract.
